A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As as die hard Star Wars fan\, I want to like this movie\, but I can't shake the feeling that I've come away deeply disappointed. I feel that so many elements of the original and new franchise were mishandled or poorly executed. I'm shocked at the lack of critical reviews from the media. I have to choke back the bile to admit that I feel as though I walked away from The Phantom Menace with a more positive feeling than I did with The Last Jedi. Perhaps my sense of this movie will change after the second viewing (for which I\, unfortunately\, already have tickets).
